name: Putt-Putt and Pep's Dog on a Stick
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from Humble.

merge.src: $CACHE/drive_c/Games/Humongous Entertainment/Putt-Putt and Pep's Dog on a Stick

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Humble installer
game:
  game_id: dog
  path: $GAMEDIR
  subtitles: true
installer:
- task:
    args: /S
    executable: $file1
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $CACHE
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/drive_c/Games/Humongous Entertainment/Putt-Putt and Pep's Dog on a
      Stick
scummvm:
  gfx-mode: 2x
